name: Solution Corporate Finance
overview:
Solution Corporate Finance is a leading independent investment banking advisory boutique specialising in the provision of strategic lead advisory services to the small deal market.

Solution advises on all aspects of corporate finance transactions from mergers and acquisitions (M&A) and company sales to management buy-outs or buy-ins (MBO’s/MBI’s).

Solution provides the ‘premium’ research based model for selling businesses in the mid market. However Solution employs this ‘City’ model on smaller transactions where this standard of advice in not always available to clients.

As the UK’s largest and most experienced small deal specialist Solution offer corporate finance advice and assistance to clients around the globe.

Solution Corporate Finance is a full service lead advisory boutique founded upon the Guiding Principles of Honest, Integrity, Dependability, Thoroughness and Excellence.

As a full service lead advisory business we assist owner-managers, management teams and corporate clients with company sales, acquisitions and management buy-outs of unquoted businesses. At the heart of every service provided by Solution is our global research capability and our strict adherence to the demand for confidentiality.

A merger or acquisition can add considerable value to a business but making sure that each stage of the transaction process is successful demands experience knowledge and understanding. Our Corporate Finance professionals provide the full range of M&A and financial advisory services, from mergers and acquisitions and company sales to management buy-outs or buy-ins (MBO’s/MBO’s).

Our clients include owner-managers, large corporates, financial institutions (private equity and venture capital), portfolio managers, management teams and private investors.
